attributes.action: Abolish the Housing Market Renewal Pathfinder Housecrusher Programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Policy was introduced by John Prescott supposedly to regenerate areas where housing markets had "collapsed" in reality the markets had not "collapsed" and it had the effect of spurring housing associations to deliberately run down areas to create the impression of "decline" and "market collapse" so that they could justify the compulsory purchase.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Abolish the Housing Market Renewal Pathfinder Housecrusher Programme."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14577.asp

Prime Minister's Office
